name: Till the Day I Die
description:
Till the Day I Die is a turn-based roguelike with heavy RNG elements. The game has you fighting and collecting items to get stronger in order to defeat the big ass carcossonne dude.

Instructions how to play:

You throw the dice (Mouse button 1) to in order to receive tiles corresponding to the tile pool on your left. Then you Place the tiles in order to create your own game board.

You get money from combat tiles so be sure to have many of them, but as these deal damage you should try to have ample time to heal at the heal tiles as well.
